name: PSA - Don't be a Cyberbully
description:
CYBERBULLY. One of the most silent biggest problems of our time. I had the privilege of directing such an important subjects awareness campaign.

I would like to thank my entire crew at #Filmpark and wonderfully talented cast. Also I would like to thank #SamsungTürkiye for sponsoring such an important spot.

PLEASE SHARE TO RAISE AWARENESS.
